column4: oh on a side note. . . when I go to tty (since the last update came through three days ago) I have a ton of drdy err messages
have you got the partition mounted?
if your partition is dodgy it most likley dodgy
if your partition is dodgy it most likley won't mount
so make sure the partition is not mounted
what did you have on it?
ok what did sudo fdisk -l say
